definition: (slang) girl/chick/babe
bandit/brigand/gambling chip/see 馬桶|马桶
horse/CL:匹[pi3]/horse or cavalry piece in Chinese chess/knight in Western chess
surname Ma/abbr. for Malaysia 馬來西亞|马来西亚[Ma3 lai2 xi1 ya4]
(noun suffix)

son/child/seed/egg/small thing/1st earthly branch: 11 p.m.-1 a.m., midnight, 11th solar month (7th December to 5th January), year of the Rat/Viscount, fourth of five orders of nobility 五等爵位[wu3 deng3 jue2 wei4]/ancient Chinese compass point: 0° (north)
to pick up a girl/to get a girl

sentences.english: You want to see the organism hybridized from the dragon and the horse?
sentences.chinese: 爲什麼小龍女不願意當奧巴馬的馬子啊？

sentences.english: Every day T'ao went to the north yard where Ma lived, and helped him care for the chrysanthemums.
sentences.chinese: 陶三郎每天去馬子才住的北院，幫他培養菊花。

sentences.english: My chances of ever being in a relationship are now next to zero.
sentences.chinese: 看來我絕對不會有釣到馬子的可能性了。

sentences.english: T'ao seemed to be very poor, and ate his meals at Ma's house every day.
sentences.chinese: 陶三郎家好像很貧窮，平日都在馬子才家喫飯。

sentences.english: That chick is super hot in that mini-skirt.
sentences.chinese: 那個馬子穿那件迷你裙超辣的。

sentences.english: For my Ma, I have a boundless love.
sentences.chinese: 對於我的馬子，我有無限的愛戀。

sentences.english: Ever wonder why "bad boys" and criminals get the women?
sentences.chinese: 你曾疑惑過爲什麼“壞小子”和罪犯們能泡到馬子？

wheat/barley/oats
